com.google.gwt.gwtai.trayicon.impl
Class TrayAccessJDIC

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              java.applet.Applet
                  javax.swing.JApplet
                      com.google.gwt.gwtai.trayicon.impl.TrayAccessJDIC
All Implemented Interfaces:
Applet, TrayIconApplet, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer
public class TrayAccessJDIC
extends javax.swing.JApplet
implements TrayIconApplet

Accesses the system tray using JDIC for machines running a JRE < 1.6.

Author:
Adrian Buerki
See Also:
Serialized Form

injectTrayNativLib

public void injectTrayNativLib()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
Extract the tray.dll or libtray.so (depending on the Operating System) into a temporary location and add this very location to the java.library.path path.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - In case of an error.
